required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Pentoxifylline and Zinc Co-administration in Patients With Oligoasthenoteratozoospermia
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluating the Therapeutic Effect of Pentoxifylline and Zinc Co-administration in Patients With Idiopathic Oligoasthenoteratozoospermia

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to investigate the impact of co-administration of Pentoxifylline and Zinc sulfate on oxidative stress, apoptosis, and inflammation, sperm capacitation and parameters in infertile men.

detailed_description.textblock: Design: Clinical trial with placebo-control group, parallel groups, double-blind, randomized Settings and conduct This study will perform on infertile men referred to shafa infertility treatment center in shafa hospital ( in khorramabad city). In this study Both participants and researchers or evaluators of the outcome are unaware of the allocation of study groups. Participants/Inclusion and exclusion criteria Inclusion criteria: Infertile men referred to the infertility treatment center who, have had at least one year of unprotected intercourse, Natural fertility has not happened in their spouse. These men will all be married These men will be between the ages of 20 and 50. According to WHO criteria, Sperm parameters abnormalities should be observed in at least two spermogram within 2 weeks. Exclusion criteria: Single men Men with varicocele or any other specific disease Men who have taken a particular drug for the past three months. .1. Control group: participants take placebo for 3 months. 2.participants take pentoxiphylline (400 mg/day) for 3 months. 3. participants take zinc (zinc sulfate) (220 mg/day) for 3 months. 4. participants take pentoxiphylline (400 mg daily) and Zinc (Zinc sulfate) (220 mg daily) for 3 months.Semen analysis and sperm parameters (Spermogram;). Levels of LH, FSH and Testosterone; Malondialdehyde Level; TNF-α and Interleukin 10; DNA Fragmentation; Sperm viability; Total antioxidant level of semen; Expression of Caspase 3, BAX, BCL2 genes; Caspase-3, BAX, BCL2 proteins; Sperm maturation; Evaluation of sperm capacitation All of the aforementioned analyzes measure in two stages before and after the study.

primary_outcome.time_frame: One week after starting the medication
primary_outcome.description: count of sperm(In per million - with the help of a neobar slide and microscopic observation

primary_outcome.time_frame: One week after starting the medication
primary_outcome.description: motility of sperm: Calculate the percentage of motile sperm using microscopic observation

primary_outcome.time_frame: One week after starting the medication
primary_outcome.description: Calculate the percentage of sperm with a normal shape with the help of Papanic staining

primary_outcome.time_frame: One week after starting the medication
primary_outcome.description: Malondialdehyde (nmol/mL), will be measured using related experimental kits

primary_outcome.time_frame: One week after starting the medication
primary_outcome.description: reactive oxygen species (ROS (RLU/s)), will be measured using related experimental kits

primary_outcome.time_frame: One week after starting the medication
primary_outcome.description: total antioxidant capacity (TAC (/m / l)) will be measured using related experimental kits

primary_outcome.time_frame: One week after starting the medication
primary_outcome.description: FSH (IU / L) will be measured from the blood serum of volunteers using ELISA kit

primary_outcome.time_frame: One week after starting the medication
primary_outcome.description: LH (IU / L) will be measured from the blood serum of volunteers using ELISA kit

primary_outcome.time_frame: One week after starting the medication
primary_outcome.description: testosterone (nanomolar per liter) will be measured from the blood serum of volunteers using ELISA kit

primary_outcome.time_frame: One week after starting the medication
primary_outcome.description: TNF α( Tissue necrosis Factor) (pg/mL) as an inflammatory factor will be measured using related experimental kit

primary_outcome.time_frame: One week after starting the medication
primary_outcome.description: Interleukin-6 (IL-6)/(pg/mL) as an inflammatory factor will be measured using related experimental kit

primary_outcome.time_frame: One week after starting the medication
primary_outcome.description: DNA fragmentation will be assessed using an SDFA kit and microscopic observations (as a percentage of damaged sperm).

other_outcome.description: expression of caspase 3 gen (in p.c) using real-time PCR and Western blot
expression of BAX gen(in p.c) using real-time PCR and Western blot
expression of BCL 2 gen (in p.c) using real-time PCR and Western blot

arm_group.description: Control group: oral rehydration salts (ORS, Poursina, Tehran, Iran), two times daily
Intervention group 1: received pentoxifylline (TRENTAL 400 mg modified release tablets, OSPS; 400 mg ,two times daily)
Intervention group 2: received zinc ( Zinc Sulfate 220mg Capsules,One time daily)
Intervention group 3: received pentoxifylline+ zinc (TRENTAL 400 mg modified release tablets, OSPS; 400 mg ,two times daily + Zinc Sulfate 220mg Capsules,One time daily )

intervention.description: Infertile men referred to the infertility treatment center who, have had at least one year of unprotected intercourse, Natural fertility has not happened in their spouse. These men will all be married These men will be between the ages of 20 and 50. According to WHO criteria, Sperm parameters abnormalities should be observed in at least two spermogram within 2 weeks. Candidates receive two placebo tablets daily

Infertile men referred to the infertility treatment center who, have had at least one year of unprotected intercourse, Natural fertility has not happened in their spouse. These men will all be married These men will be between the ages of 20 and 50. According to WHO criteria, Sperm parameters abnormalities should be observed in at least two spermogram within 2 weeks. Candidates receive two trental tablets daily

Infertile men referred to the infertility treatment center who, have had at least one year of unprotected intercourse, Natural fertility has not happened in their spouse. These men will all be married These men will be between the ages of 20 and 50. According to WHO criteria, Sperm parameters abnormalities should be observed in at least two spermogram within 2 weeks. Candidates receive one zinc sulfate tablet daily

Infertile men referred to the infertility treatment center who, have had at least one year of unprotected intercourse, Natural fertility has not happened in their spouse. These men will all be married These men will be between the ages of 20 and 50. According to WHO criteria, Sperm parameters abnormalities should be observed in at least two spermogram within 2 weeks. Candidates receive two pentoxifylline tablets+ one zinc tablet daily

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Idiopathic infertile men
- have had at least one year of unprotected intercourse infertility
- Sperm parameters abnormality
Exclusion Criteria:
- Men with varicocele
- Hypersensitivity to pentoxifylline & zinc,
- pelvic organic pathologies
- congenital adrenal hyperplasia
- thyroid dysfunction
- Cushing's syndrome
- hyper prolactinemia
- androgen secreting neoplasia
- diabetes mellitus
- consumption of medications affecting carbohydrate metabolism
- severe hepatic
- pancreatitis
- kidney diseases
- gallbladder diseases
- Patients with alcohol consumption
- Patients who use cigarettes and drugs
